sampleWorkItems.title: Analytics and Reporting Dashboard
sampleWorkItems.description: Build an interactive dashboard with real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization capabilities

sampleWorkItems.title: Single Sign-On (SSO) Integration
sampleWorkItems.description: Enable users to authenticate using SSO providers like Azure AD, Okta, and Google Workspace

sampleWorkItems.title: User can login with Microsoft credentials
sampleWorkItems.description: As a user, I want to login using my Microsoft account so that I don't need to create a separate password
sampleWorkItems.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I'm on the login page
When I click 'Login with Microsoft'
Then I'm redirected to Microsoft login
And after successful authentication, I'm logged into the application

sampleWorkItems.title: Configure Azure AD application registration
sampleWorkItems.description: Register the application in Azure AD and configure redirect URIs, API permissions, and client secrets

sampleWorkItems.title: Login fails with special characters in password
sampleWorkItems.description: Users cannot login when their password contains special characters like @ or #
sampleWorkItems.reproSteps:
1. Create user with password containing '@' symbol
2. Navigate to login page
3. Enter username and password
4. Click Login
Expected: User should be logged in
Actual: Error message 'Invalid credentials' displayed

benefits: I can complete my tasks faster
